docs.title: Hytale Formats Wiki
docs.text:
This is an Unofficial Hytale wiki documenting all of the games external file formats.

This wiki is early in development and is a work in progress so a lot of information will likely be missing or incorrect.

You can find the pages for information you want by either using the search bar at the top right or the navigation bar on the left.

docs.title: Chunk format
docs.text: Chunks store the terrain and entities within a 32×320×32 area in the world. They also store precomputed lighting, heightmap data for Hytale's performance, and other meta information.

docs.title: History
docs.text:
Early Access

2026.01.13-dcad8778f The chunk format is introduced. Chunks are divided into 10 individual 32×32×32 block sections.

docs.title: Level format
docs.text: Each level is its own folder. A level folder itself (can be empty) is how the game identifies a level, along with other subfolders to store the maps and regions of the level.

docs.title: Directory structure
docs.text:
This is the directory structure of the Hytale/Saves folder, where the game saves the entire world data:

  • : A world directory.
    • log
      • <yyyy>-<mm>-<dd>_<HH>-<MM>-<SS>_server.log
    • mods: Stores the installed mods that are used with this world.
      • Hytale_Shop
        • barter_shop_state.json
    • universe
      • players: Stores the individual states of the players that have played in this world.
        • <uuid>.json: A json file of the player. See Player.json format. (Coming Soon)
      • worlds
        • default: The default world, normally Orbis.
          • chunks: Stores region files of the world.
            • <x>.<z>.region.bin: A region file. See Chunk format.
          • resources
            • BlockCounter.json
            • BlockMapMarkers.json
            • InstanceData.json
            • PrefabEditSession.json
            • ReputationData.json
            • SpawnSuppressionController.json
            • Time.json
          • config.json
      • memories.json
    • bans.json
    • config.json
    • permissions.json
    • preview.png
    • whitelist.json

docs.title: Version history
docs.text: Hytale has been in constant development since 2015 and first released publicly in early access on January 13, 2026.

Early Access was the initial development phase of Hytale released to the public.

Version Revision Full release 2026.01.13 dcad8778f January 13, 2026 2026.01.13 50e69c385 January 13, 2026
